name: aquifer
description: Automated Qa UI tests For wEbdRiverio

scripts.start: npm run lint && d=$(date '+%Y%m%d') && t=$(date '+%l:%M:%S%p') && ./node_modules/.bin/wdio ./wdio-conf/wdio.conf.js --runDate "$d" --runTime "$t" --suite dev
scripts.start_docker: npm run lint && docker rm -f aquifer || true && docker run -d -p 4444:4444 --name aquifer --shm-size=2g selenium/standalone-chrome:3.141.59-europium && sleep .5                                                  && d=$(date '+%Y%m%d') && t=$(date '+%l:%M:%S%p') && ./node_modules/.bin/wdio  /wdio-conf/wdio.conf.js --runDate "$d" --runTime "$t" --suite dev
scripts.quick_docker: docker rm -f aquifer || true && docker run -d -p 4444:4444 --name aquifer --shm-size=2g selenium/standalone-chrome:3.141.59-europium && sleep 1                                                  && d=$(date '+%Y%m%d') && t=$(date '+%l:%M:%S%p') && ./node_modules/.bin/wdio  ./wdio-conf/wdio.conf.js --runDate "$d" --runTime "$t" --suite dev
